alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 2:28PM CST until February 22 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 11 inches possible Wednesday through Thursday. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. Total snowfall accumulations through Thursday of 7 to 15 inches possible. * WHERE...In Minnesota, West Otter Tail, East Otter Tail and Grant Counties. In North Dakota, Sargent County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 AM Tuesday to midnight CST Tuesday night. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Tuesday night through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail
